dc_title_s: Map of North and South Carolina : exhibiting the post offices post roads, canals, rail roads &c.
dc_description_s: Detailed map showing relief by hachures, drainage, township and county boundaries, cities and towns, canals, roads, and railroads.|From his The American Atlas (London, J. Arrowsmith, 1839).; Description derived from published bibliography.|91 x 124 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:650,000|General Map Collection
